# AI FoundryIQ Demo Project

This is a Python-based AI demo project for FoundryIQ.

## Project Structure
- `src/` - Main application source code
- `tests/` - Unit tests
- `requirements.txt` - Python dependencies

## Development Guidelines
- Use Python 3.10+
- Follow PEP 8 style guidelines
- Use type hints for function signatures
- Write docstrings for all public functions and classes

## AI/Agent Development
- This project is designed for AI agent development
- Follow AI Toolkit best practices when implementing agents
